name: Dragon Deity King of Resurgence, Dragveda
effect: Additional Effect - Choose one of your vanguards, and [Stand] it!

name: Hades Dragon Deity of Resentment, Gallmageheld
effect: Additional Effect - You get "During your turn, all of your vanguards get [Power] +10000/[Critical] +1" until end of this fight!

name: Star Dragon Deity of Infinitude, Eldobreath
effect: Additional Effect - Double the [Power] and [Critical] of all of your front row units until end of turn!

name: Light Dragon Deity of Honors, Amartinoa
effect: Additional Effect - Until end of turn, you also perform drive checks for the battles your rear-guards attack!

name: Source Dragon Deity of Blessings, Blessfavor
effect: Additional Effect - Draw a card! Choose one of your units, and it gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn! All of your front row units get [Power] +10000! If your damage zone has the same number of cards as your opponent's or more, choose a card from your damage zone, and heal it!

name: Greatest Star, Esteranza
effect: Additional Effect - During this fight, you get "During your turn, all your rear-guards get [Power] +10000"!
